about_the_game:
Desert Drift is an adrenaline-fueled off-road rally adventure that challenges you to maneuver your vehicle across the unforgiving sands of the desert. With a focus on creativity and self-expression, Desert Drift lets you take full control over your car's appearance, ensuring that your ride is just as unique as the path you choose.

Key Features:


  • Customize Your Car: Personalize your car's bodywork and paint, creating a vehicle that stands out on the track.
  • Desert Rallies: Put your car to the test in dangerous rallies, where the competition is fierce and the clock is always ticking.
  • Open Desert Landscapes: Speed through vast desert environments, choosing your own path for every rally.
  • Leaderboards: Test your skills in time trials, climb the global leaderboards, and challenge other players by beating their top times.

Jump, drift, and dominate the desert in Desert Drift!

short_description: Fierce rally competitions dominate the desert landscape. Open-ended maps challenge you to try multiple different approaches to find the shortest path. The only boundary is the finish line, and your only enemy is time. Well, also physics. But mostly time.
